title: Morning Light (Lumiere Matinale)
credit_line: Purchase: gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles J. Rosenbloom
provenance_text:
Hasan Kaptan [b. 1942], Paris, France, until December 1964 [1]; purchased from the artist by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1965 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 229 in "The 1964 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1964 - January 1965. The Turkish artist lived in France at this time. 
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the 1964 International as a gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles J. Rosenbloom, Pittsburgh, PA. Payment to the artist (through Carnegie Institute's representative in France) was sent on December 10, 1964. The painting was accessioned the following year, on May 11, 1965.
